content: pretzel by annie baker jumpercablesknitting com pretzel scarf can be worn twisted knotted or even tied into a cowl this design is knit from end to end using fingering weight yarn and has bands of stockinette and reverse stockinette stitches you can knit to your preferred length or until yarn runs out this design will also work with lace or dk weight yarns enjoy materials 3 50mm / us 4 needles / uk 9 minimum 525 meters / 570 yards fingering weight yarn 1 stitch marker gauge 24 stitches in stockinette stitch = 4 inches measurements approximate after blocking 14 inches at widest part x 68 inches long notes -stitch marker is used to keep track of cdd position -blocking is required -length is adjustable just knit to your preferred length or until yarn runs out -you may use lace sport or dk weight yarns ©copyright august 2017 annie baker all rights reserved this pattern may be used for non-commercial personal use only it may not be used in any publication in print nor should it be reproduced in electronic/digital format without permission please do not share copy photograph or distribute this pattern ©copyright august 2017 annie baker all rights reserved this pattern may be used for non-commercial personal use only it may not be used in any publication in print nor should it be reproduced in electronic/digital format without permission please do not share copy photograph or distribute this pattern abbreviations k = knit p = purl sm = stitch marker sl1k = slip one stitch as if to knit sl1p = slip one stitch as if to purl st s = stitch es kfb = knit into front and back of next stitch pfb = purl into front and back of next stitch cdd = slip next two stitches as if to knit two together knit one stitch pass two slipped stitches over knit stitch instructions using long tail method loosely cast on 7 stitches proceed to section one section one stitch count indicated in parentheses at the end of each row row 1 kfb k1 cdd k1 kfb 7 row 2 pfb p to last st pfb 9 row 3 kfb k2 cdd k2 kfb 9 row 4 pfb p to last st pfb 11 row 5 kfb k3 cdd k3 kfb 11 row 6 pfb p8 place sm p1 pfb 13 row 7 kfb k to sm slip sm k2 cdd k to last st kfb 13 row 8 pfb p to sm remove sm p1 place sm p to last st pfb 15 row 9 kfb k to sm slip sm k2 cdd k to last st kfb 15 row 10 pfb p to sm remove sm p1 place sm p to last st pfb 17 row 11 13 15 17 19 pfb p to sm slip sm p2 cdd p to last st pfb 17 row 12 14 16 18 20 k to 4 sts before sm p3 k1 remove sm k1 place sm
